abstract: A half-dozen media companies have signaled that they plan to bid for the Weather Channel, which is up for auction, people involved in the talks said Wednesday.
snippet: A half-dozen media companies have signaled that they plan to bid for the Weather Channel, which is up for auction, people involved in the talks said Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: A half-dozen media companies have signaled that they plan to bid for the Weather Channel, which is up for auction, people involved in the talks said Wednesday.

headline.main: Deadline Nears for Weather Channel Bids
headline.print_headline: Weather Channel Draws Bevy of Suitors
